thread.title: Rouble slides to 2016 lows on sanctions sell-off

title: Rouble slides to 2016 lows on sanctions sell-off
text:
Rouble slides to 2016 lows on sanctions sell-off 5:19pm BST - 01:54 
The rouble dipped lower on Wednesday, hitting its lowest levels since 2016, as fears of increased geopolitical tensions with the West and new U.S. sanctions against Moscow eclipsed higher oil prices. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
